name: Ads & Glory
description:
You're late for your bus! You think you can make it in time, but navigating the city's obstacles while scrolling through your feeds is proving more difficult than expected... especially since your ad blocker is broken.

Created for an internal game jam at The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts Schools of Architecture, Design and Conservation.

Controls

Left mouse button to click Jump button and close ads
Q to return to title screen

Created by

Weronika Kulis
Sarah Marcussen
Nikolaj Munk
Mark Outridge
Bjørn Sørensen
